ax.ha.it.smsalarm

Class NotificationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • IntentService
      • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.NotificationHelper

  • public class NotificationHelper
extends IntentService
    Helper class to build up and show notifications, also creates pending intent for the notification. Contains some deprecated functionality, this is to support Android SDK versions below 11.
    Since:
    0.9beta
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Robert Nyholm

    • Method Detail

      • onHandleIntent

        protected void onHandleIntent(Intent i)
        Deprecated. 
        Overridden method to handle intent, build up and show notification. Contains some deprecated functionality just to support Android SDK versions below 11.
        Parameters:
        i - Intent for notification
        See Also:
        NotificationHelper(), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), getPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, DataTypes, Context)

      • setNotificationTexts

        private void setNotificationTexts(int icon,
                        String tickerText,
                        String rescueService,
                        String contentTitle,
                        String contentText)
        To set texts and icon for a notification. The ticker text is built up dynamically depending on argument rescueService
        Parameters:
        icon - Icon as integer value, use android.R.drawable.*
        tickerText - Notifications ticker text
        rescueService - String that may or may not contain rescue service's name
        contentTitle - Notification contents title
        contentText - Notifications content
